releaseNotes:
Noty v2.1 - Complete Arabic Localization

• Full Arabic Support: Complete translation of the entire application interface to Arabic
• Right-to-Left (RTL) Layout: Proper RTL support throughout the application
• Localized Notifications: All alerts, reminders, and notification messages in Arabic
• Voice Recorder Localization: Arabic translations for voice recording and transcription features
• Widget Localization: Complete Arabic support for the home screen widget
• Update System Localization: Update notifications and dialogs now available in Arabic
• Consistent Experience: Unified Arabic terminology throughout the app
